issue.title: [CF 816] Consider developing a DogTag module for player stats
issue.body:
This has come up multiple times and it is definitely an area in which TMW is lacking. Not really a TMW issue per se, but definitely something I want to do (wouldn't be too hard either).

http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/tellmewhen?comment=3762

Quote:

Hi, I was thinking my icon that currently shows Brewmaster Guard's cooldown would be even better if it showed how big my shield from using it would be if I used it at that moment. How could I show this variable text from the skill's tooltip on the icon?

I feel like I'm just missing something really simple, but I can't search comments to find the answer. :/
